features: Slim fit sits close to the body, with room for the garment to move with you
Dryride[5,000mm/5,000g]two-layer fabric is highly breathable, waterproof, and quick drying
Mapped with nylon taffeta in the hood and sleeves and polyester mesh on the body
Snap-closure chest pocket with media port, Zippered hand-warmer pockets
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
